name: Motherland space program prototype
description:
This is the first prototype for the game project Motherland space program. This prototype is for the orbital simulation of the game. 

After playing the prototype please fill out this google form:

https://goo.gl/forms/OH3pZ057Rc17V0XJ3

OBJECTIVE: Try to hit the moon with the rocket!

NOTICE!: It is a very early and simple prototype for the launching system but we still would like to know your opinion! The game deos not have a story yet.

For more info about the game please visit http://creativesaurus.com/msp.html
